This email sent to member when new answer on his question is posted.

[header]

You have got a new answer to your question  "[object_title]"
To view it, please click following link:

http://[host][object_link]

Unsubscribe link http://[host][unsubscribe_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to members who answered the question when the best answer has been chosen.

[header]

[sender_title] has chosen the best answer to a question  "[object_title]"
To view it, please click following link:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
Somebody has answered a question you are watching
This letter will be sent to the members when someone has answered the questions to which they subscribed.

To view it, please click following link:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
